meeting_info.organization: Martin Luther King, Jr. Community Center Advisory Board
meeting_info.location: Martin Luther King, Jr. Community Center, Activity Room A, Dallas, TX and online via WebEx

agenda_items.title: Call to Order/Welcome
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Invocation/Opening Statement
agenda_items.description: Invocation by an MLK Advisory Board Member.

agenda_items.title: Advisory Board Member & City Staff Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Roll call conducted by Mrs. LaRhonda Bacon.

agenda_items.title: Public Comments
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for public speakers to address the board.

agenda_items.title: Approval of May 20, 2024, Minutes
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Vote: 2025 MLK Week Emblem & Banner
